aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am Ângelo Miguel from Amélia Rodrigues, Bahia, 24 years old with a pure passion for technology. Graduated in Information Systems and working as a front-end developer, I am always ready to dive headfirst into new challenges.
